channel.title: Aviya
channel.description: Aviya's blog entails stories close to her heart

item.title: Aviya is on the net!
item.author: Aviya
item.description: Welcome! After a long while I decided to launch a website about my music and arts! I hope you enjoy your visits here and come back often!

item.title: Flight of Time - debut album ready for launch!!
item.author: Aviya

item.description: I've just released my new Flight of Time album!

item.description: Have you bought all the presents for your loved ones already?

item.title: Emotion the essence of expression

item.description: How much is emotion part of our expression?

item.title: What's Happiness by the way? (spring is here)
item.author: Aviya
item.link: http://www.aviyacrest.com/blog/entry/title/What's Happiness by the way? (spring is here)
item.description: Message for the spring! Have you ever wondered what the definition is of happiness? What makes you happy?

item.title: Fairly odd Mother
item.author: Aviya
item.description: The other day I realised how much we can learn about ourselves from little children. It can also make you remember to value your friends!

item.title: Choice
item.author: Aviya
item.description:
Aviya's birthday is coming up and it's going to be the longest day of the year... seriously!

Read here how cause and effect is related to the choices we make.

item.title: Mermaids
item.author: Aviya
item.description: Ever had a recurring dream? I have. Read here about the meaning of mermaids as dream symbols

item.title: A Definite Maybe
item.author: Aviya
item.description:
(a short story based on real life events)

Dedicated to the man from the street that took the time to share his life story with me.
